description.value:
Special: Blast (3), Sanctified

Note: Space Holy Hand Grenade. +5 to Willpower Tests vs Fear/Pinning for Squad possessing them. Bonus lost when all grenades used, unless the last one kills/causes Critical Damage on an enemy, in which case, bonus lasts for the rest of the session. Always Good/Best Craftsmanship
